column5: This renovated and spacious 3 bedroom/2 bath home is designed for comfort and entertaining in a safe family neighborhood just 15 minutes south of downtown Austin. There is a peaceful master suite with king bed and double bath vanities as well as 2 queens, a twin, crib, and air mattress in other rooms. You'll feel at home with the comfy beds, over-sized L-shaped couch, fully stocked kitchen, and big beautiful yard with lots of games and amenities.
